ayis krim asuranayaka wyaja lesapathulak sakas kara heroyin gram 20 k athura ee mathata kukulu maswyanjanayak dama kolambaa rimand bandhanagaraye randawiyakuta laba dimata pamini pudgalayaku bandhanagara buddhi ansha niladharin wisin eeye (13) athadanguwata gena atha.mema heroyinwala watinakama rupiyal 1,30,000 k pamana wethayi bandhanagara buddhi anshaya kiyayi.aayudha langa thaba ganima saha minimarum chodana matha kolambaa rimand bandhanagaraye randawa sitina mema randawiya hamuwimata pamini panadura pradeshaye ohuge mithuraku mese buddhi ansha niladharinge parikshawata lakwa atha.me athara pereda (12) bandhanagara buddhi ansha niladharin walikada kantha anshaye sidu kala sodisimeheyumaka di randawiyaku balimata pamini ayaku gena aa pikudu wyanjanayaka thibi heroyin mili gram 500soya ganimata da samathwi atha.
